full_output.summary: Im a computer science student who loves tackling challenging problems, whether working with algorithms like minimax or deep convolutional models. Im proficient in Python and enjoy a variety of tasks, from MongoDB operations to data extraction and NLP. I enjoy solving complex coding problems, especially arrays and dynamic programming. Platforms like HackerRank and LeetCode are my go-to for honing my skills, and Im always eager to apply what I learn to real-world applications.

certifications.title: Google Cloud Big Data and Machine Learning Fundamentals
ASk Questions to make Data-Driven Decisions

projects.name: Face Recognition
projects.description: Developed a Deep Learning model using Siamese neural networks for face recognition, achieving a recognition accuracy of 95%. Implemented in Python using OpenCV and the Kivy APP.

projects.name: SMS classifier
projects.description: Created a machine learning model using Python, NLTK, and Streamlit to classify SMS messages as spam or ham (not spam), achieving an accuracy of 97%. Designed a user-friendly frontend using Streamlit for the model, enabling easy classification of messages.

projects.name: Melanoma Classification
projects.description: Developed a Deep Learning model using Python, TensorFlow, and Scikit-Learn to classify skin images as melanoma or non-melanoma, achieving an accuracy of 82%.

experiences.description: Independently developed an advanced SMS spam detection system using Naive Bayes and key NLP frameworks. Achieved a 97% reduction in spam messages and significantly improved user engagement. Solely engineered a predictive model for Titanic survival using regression analysis, surpassing industry benchmarks with an 80 % accuracy rate. Provided valuable insights for risk assessment and disaster planning.

full_output.name: Aniket Shivam
